name: ripple-binary-codec

scripts.compile: babel --optional runtime -d distrib/npm/ src/ && cp src/enums/definitions.json distrib/npm/enums
scripts.lint: if ! [ -f eslintrc ]; then curl -o eslintrc 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ripple/javascript-style-guide/es6/eslintrc'; echo 'parser: babel-eslint' >> eslintrc; fi; eslint -c eslintrc src/**/*.js test/*.js examples/*.js
scripts.prepublish: npm test && npm run lint && npm run compile
